message.name: ERR_XFV_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: An end reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_BEFORE_RELATED_DOB
message.locale: Relationship start date must not be earlier than related concern role date of birth - %1d.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_AFTER_RELATED_DOD
message.locale: Relationship start date must not be later than related concern role date of death - %1d.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_BEFORE_DOB
message.locale: Relationship start date must not be earlier than concern role date of birth - %1d.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_AFTER_DOD
message.locale: Relationship start date must not be later than concern role date of death - %1d.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_BEFORE_RELATED_REGISTRATION

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_BEFORE_REGISTRATION
message.locale: Relationship start date must not be earlier than concern role registration date - %1d.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_AFTER_END
message.locale: Relationship start date must not be later than concern role end date - %1d.
